Package ROS

ROS is an rosBridge client implementation for android applications.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RosBridgeListener
    This is a listener interface that all Android Cctivity classes should implement as long as it want to receive message with Rosbridge.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RosBridgeConnection
    This is a singleton class that establishes a customised websocket connection with the robot using package JAVA-WEBSOCKET..
    RosMsgRaw
    Gson object class: Raw RosMessage it can be a rosTopic message or service message as it only has the op field
    RosServiceMessage
    Gson object class: RosServiceMessage is a service message can be either a call or a response
    RosTopicMessage
    Gson object class: A general class of RosTopicMessage for all other type of Ros Topic message Json serialisation and de-serialisation
    RosTopicMessage_MsgGeometry_Point
    Gson object class: A class of the "msg" field of a rosTopicMessage, "Geometry_Point" is a rosMessage type, Refer to Ros Documentation.
    RosTopicMessage_MsgGeometry_Pose  
    RosTopicMessage_MsgGeometry_Quaternion  
    RosTopicMessage_MsgGeometry_Twist
    Gson object class: A class of the "msg" field of a rosTopicMessage, "Geometry_Twist" is a rosMessage type, Refer to Ros Documentation.
    RosTopicMessage_MsgGeometry_Vector3
    Gson object class: A class of the "msg" field of a rosTopicMessage, "Geometry_Vector3" is a rosMessage type, Refer to Ros Documentation.
    RosTopicMessage_MsgNavMsgs_MapMetaData  
    RosTopicMessage_MsgNavMsgs_OccupancyGrid  
    RosTopicMessage_MsgSensorMsgs_JointState
    Gson object class: A class of the "msg" field of a rosTopicMessage, "SensorMsgs_JointState" is a rosMessage type, Refer to Ros Documentation.
    RosTopicMessage_MsgStd_Header
    Gson object class: A class of the "msg" field of a rosTopicMessage, "SensorStd_Header" is a rosMessage type, Refer to Ros Documentation.
    RosTopicMessage_MsgTrajectory_JointTrajectory
    Gson object class: A class of the "msg" field of a rosTopicMessage, "Trajectory_JointTrajectory" is a rosMessage type, Refer to Ros Documentation.
    RosTopicMessage_MsgTrajectory_JointTrajectoryPoints
    Gson object class: A class of the "msg" field of a rosTopicMessage, "Trajectory_JointTrajectoryPoints" is a rosMessage type, Refer to Ros Documentation.

Package ROS Description

ROS is an rosBridge client implementation for android applications. With Ros, you can communicate with rosBridge through rosTopic Messages and rosServices

It is strongly suggested to read RosBridge Protocol before reading the doc and code

It has two Parts, first part is a RosBridge Listener interface and a messaging handling class, which deal with the messaging The second part are all rosMessage class: A class named as RosTopicMessage_MsgTYPE means it is a complete string field for msg after get serialised

Author:
Transforma Robotics - Lyu Zizheng
